name: Devil Starengers
description:
Devil Starengers is a bullet hell boss rush.

Wield a magic crossbow that can absorb bullets and shoot them back at the Five Devil Sentai.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

J, Z, or Space to shield

X, K, or F to shoot

Hold Shield or Shift to focus / slow down

(Press 1 to toggle god mode)

Winner of a 24 hour Columbia College Chicago spring break game jam with the theme "Penta."

Credits:

Lane Howard - Programming, Sound

Ja'ire Vaughn - Art

Fallon Braddy - Music
